2:
--------------------
Text: QuickDraw:  QuickDraw still existed as part of the libraries of Mac OS X, but had been largely superseded by the more modern Quartz graphics system.
Triplets:<QuickDraw
4:
<Text: QuickDraw:  In Mac OS X v10.5 applications using QuickDraw cannot make use of the added 64-bit support.>
Triplets:<QuickDraw
5:
--------------------
Text: QuickDraw:  In Mac OS X v10.8, QuickDraw header support was removed from the operating system.

Triplets:<QuickDraw
6:
--------------------
Text: QuickDraw:  Applications using QuickDraw will still run under OS X 10.8 through macOS 10.12; however, the current versions of Xcode and the macOS SDK do not contain the header files to compile such programs.

Triplets:<QuickDraw
